titleInfo.title: Plan of survey of lots in the City of Hamilton between Concession and Markland Streets being part of lot 16 in 3 Concession
titleInfo.subTitle: Township of Barton the property of Alexander McInnes Esq

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; sheet 45 x 46 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso.

mods.note: "Scale 50 ft = 1 inch". Date appears below the title, "Hamilton Nov 5, 1872". Shows 27 numbered land parcels. Streets appearing on map include: Concession Street [now Aberdeen Avenue], Markland Street, [Hess Street], and [Bruce Street]. "No 105 Drawer 4", written along left edge.
